Instruction: Slice the French bread into desired thickness.
Mince the garlic cloves and chop the fresh parsley.
In a small bowl, mix together minced garlic, softened butter, chopped parsley, and salt.
Spread the garlic butter mixture evenly on each slice of bread.
Wrap the bread in aluminum foil and place on a baking sheet.
Bake in the preheated oven for 10-15 minutes, or until the bread is warm and the butter is melted.
Unwrap the bread and broil for an additional 2-3 minutes until the top is golden brown and crispy.
Serve hot as a delicious and fragrant side dish.
